testsuite.name: ClassService unit test

testcase.name: Setting a class name to an invalid name should return InvalidClassIdException
Setting the name of a class should change the class name
create() should return NullPointerException when called with null name
Setting the name of a class to null should return IllegalArgumentException
create() should return DuplicateClassNameException when the given name is already taken
Checking if an existing class id exists should return true
Checking if a non-existent class exists should return false
Getting an invalid class id should return InvalidClassIdException
Getting a class id should return the correct class
count() call the count function of ClassRepository and return its same value
Setting the name of a class that does not exist should return ClassIdNotFoundException
create() should return IllegalArgumentException when called with an empty name
Setting a class name to a name that is taken should return DuplicateClassNameException
